verses.verse: Now Yericho <WH3405> was straitly <WH5462> <WH8802> shut up <WH5462> <WH8794> because <WH6440> of the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>: none went out <WH3318> <WH8802>, and none came in <WH935> <WH8802>.

And the YY <WH3068> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto Y'hoshuw`a <WH3091>, See <WH7200> <WH8798>, I have given <WH5414> <WH8804> into thine hand <WH3027> Yericho <WH3405>, and the king <WH4428> thereof, and the mighty men <WH1368> of valour <WH2428>.

And ye shall compass <WH5437> <WH8804> the city <WH5892>, all ye men <WH582> of war <WH4421>, and go round about <WH5362> <WH8687> the city <WH5892> once <WH6471> <WH259>. Thus shalt thou do <WH6213> <WH8799> six <WH8337> days <WH3117>.

And seven <WH7651> Kohanim <WH3548> shall bear <WH5375> <WH8799> before <WH6440> the ark <WH727> seven <WH7651> shofars <WH7782> of rams' shofars <WH3104>: and the seventh <WH7637> day <WH3117> ye shall compass <WH5437> <WH8799> the city <WH5892> seven <WH7651> times <WH6471>, and the Kohanim <WH3548> shall blow <WH8628> <WH8799> with the shofars <WH7782>.

And it shall come to pass, that when they make a long <WH4900> <WH8800> blast with the ram's <WH3104> shofar <WH7161>, and when ye hear <WH8085> <WH8800> the sound <WH6963> of the shofar <WH7782>, all the people <WH5971> shall shout <WH7321> <WH8686> with a great <WH1419> shout <WH8643>; and the wall <WH2346> of the city <WH5892> shall fall down <WH5307> <WH8804> flat <WH8478>, and the people <WH5971> shall ascend up <WH5927> <WH8804> every man <WH376> straight before him.

And Y'hoshuw`a <WH3091> the son <WH1121> of Nun <WH5126> called <WH7121> <WH8799> the Kohanim <WH3548>, and said <WH559> <WH8799> unto them, Take up <WH5375> <WH8798> the ark <WH727> of the covenant <WH1285>, and let seven <WH7651> Kohanim <WH3548> bear <WH5375> <WH8799> seven <WH7651> shofars <WH7782> of rams' shofars <WH3104> before <WH6440> the ark <WH727> of the YY <WH3068>.

And he said <WH559> <WH8799> unto the people <WH5971>, Pass on <WH5674> <WH8798>, and compass <WH5437> <WH8798> the city <WH5892>, and let him that is armed <WH2502> <WH8803> pass on <WH5674> <WH8799> before <WH6440> the ark <WH727> of the YY <WH3068>.

And it came to pass, when Y'hoshuw`a <WH3091> had spoken <WH559> <WH8800> unto the people <WH5971>, that the seven <WH7651> Kohanim <WH3548> bearing <WH5375> <WH8802> the seven <WH7651> shofars <WH7782> of rams' shofars <WH3104> passed on <WH5674> <WH8804> before <WH6440> the YY <WH3068>, and blew <WH8628> <WH8804> with the shofars <WH7782>: and the ark <WH727> of the covenant <WH1285> of the YY <WH3068> followed <WH1980> <WH8802> them <WH310>.

And the armed <WH2502> <WH8803> men went <WH1980> <WH8802> before <WH6440> the Kohanim <WH3548> that blew <WH8628> <WH8802> <WH8675> <WH8628> <WH8804> with the shofars <WH7782>, and the rereward <WH622> <WH8764> came <WH1980> <WH8802> after <WH310> the ark <WH727>, the Kohanim going on <WH1980> <WH8800>, and blowing <WH8628> <WH8800> with the shofars <WH7782>.

And Y'hoshuw`a <WH3091> had commanded <WH6680> <WH8765> the people <WH5971>, saying <WH559> <WH8800>, Ye shall not shout <WH7321> <WH8686>, nor make any noise <WH8085> <WH8686> with your voice <WH6963>, neither shall any word <WH1697> proceed <WH3318> <WH8799> out of your mouth <WH6310>, until the day <WH3117> I bid <WH559> <WH8800> you shout <WH7321> <WH8685>; then shall ye shout <WH7321> <WH8689>.

So the ark <WH727> of the YY <WH3068> compassed <WH5437> <WH8686> the city <WH5892>, going about <WH5362> <WH8687> it once <WH6471> <WH259>: and they came <WH935> <WH8799> into the camp <WH4264>, and lodged <WH3885> <WH8799> in the camp <WH4264>.
And Y'hoshuw`a <WH3091> rose early <WH7925> <WH8686> in the morning <WH1242>, and the Kohanim <WH3548> took up <WH5375> <WH8799> the ark <WH727> of the YY <WH3068>.

And seven <WH7651> Kohanim <WH3548> bearing <WH5375> <WH8802> seven <WH7651> shofars <WH7782> of rams' shofars <WH3104> before <WH6440> the ark <WH727> of the YY <WH3068> went on <WH1980> <WH8802> continually <WH1980> <WH8800>, and blew <WH8628> <WH8804> with the shofars <WH7782>: and the armed men <WH2502> <WH8803> went <WH1980> <WH8802> before <WH6440> them; but the rereward <WH622> <WH8764> came <WH1980> <WH8802> after <WH310> the ark <WH727> of the YY <WH3068>, the Kohanim going on <WH1980> <WH8800>, and blowing <WH8628> <WH8800> with the shofars <WH7782>.

And the second <WH8145> day <WH3117> they compassed <WH5437> <WH8799> the city <WH5892> once <WH6471> <WH259>, and returned <WH7725> <WH8799> into the camp <WH4264>: so they did <WH6213> <WH8804> six <WH8337> days <WH3117>.

And it came to pass on the seventh <WH7637> day <WH3117>, that they rose early <WH7925> <WH8686> about the dawning <WH5927> <WH8800> of the day <WH7837>, and compassed <WH5437> <WH8799> the city <WH5892> after the same manner <WH4941> seven <WH7651> times <WH6471>: only on that day <WH3117> they compassed <WH5437> <WH8804> the city <WH5892> seven <WH7651> times <WH6471>.

And it came to pass at the seventh <WH7637> time <WH6471>, when the Kohanim <WH3548> blew <WH8628> <WH8804> with the shofars <WH7782>, Y'hoshuw`a <WH3091> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto the people <WH5971>, Shout <WH7321> <WH8685>; for the YY <WH3068> hath given <WH5414> <WH8804> you the city <WH5892>.

And the city <WH5892> shall be accursed <WH2764>, even it, and all that are therein, to the YY <WH3068>: only Rachav <WH7343> the harlot <WH2181> <WH8802> shall live <WH2421> <WH8799>, she and all that are with her in the house <WH1004>, because she hid <WH2244> <WH8689> the messengers <WH4397> that we sent <WH7971> <WH8804>.

And ye, in any wise <WH7535> keep <WH8104> <WH8798> yourselves from the accursed thing <WH2764>, lest ye make yourselves accursed <WH2763> <WH8686>, when ye take <WH3947> <WH8804> of the accursed thing <WH2764>, and make <WH7760> <WH8804> the camp <WH4264> of Yisra'EL <WH3478> a curse <WH2764>, and trouble <WH5916> <WH8804> it.

But all the silver <WH3701>, and gold <WH2091>, and vessels <WH3627> of brass <WH5178> and iron <WH1270>, are consecrated <WH6944> unto the YY <WH3068>: they shall come <WH935> <WH8799> into the treasury <WH214> of the YY <WH3068>.

So the people <WH5971> shouted <WH7321> <WH8686> when the Kohanim blew <WH8628> <WH8799> with the shofars <WH7782>: and it came to pass, when the people <WH5971> heard <WH8085> <WH8800> the sound <WH6963> of the shofar <WH7782>, and the people <WH5971> shouted <WH7321> <WH8686> with a great <WH1419> shout <WH8643>, that the wall <WH2346> fell down flat <WH5307> <WH8799>, so that the people <WH5971> went up <WH5927> <WH8799> into the city <WH5892>, every man <WH376> straight before him, and they took <WH3920> <WH8799> the city <WH5892>.

And they utterly destroyed <WH2763> <WH8686> all that was in the city <WH5892>, both man <WH376> and woman <WH802>, young <WH5288> and old <WH2205>, and ox <WH7794>, and sheep <WH7716>, and ass <WH2543>, with the edge <WH6310> of the sword <WH2719>.

But Y'hoshuw`a <WH3091> had said <WH559> <WH8804> unto the two <WH8147> men <WH582> that had spied out <WH7270> <WH8764> the country <WH776>, Go <WH935> <WH8798> into the harlot's <WH2181> <WH8802> house <WH1004>, and bring out <WH3318> <WH8685> thence the woman <WH802>, and all that she hath, as ye sware <WH7650> <WH8738> unto her.

And the young men <WH5288> that were spies <WH7270> <WH8764> went in <WH935> <WH8799>, and brought out <WH3318> <WH8686> Rachav <WH7343>, and her father <WH1>, and her mother <WH517>, and her brethren <WH251>, and all that she had; and they brought out <WH3318> <WH8689> all her kindred <WH4940>, and left <WH3240> <WH8686> them without <WH2351> the camp <WH4264> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>.

And they burnt <WH8313> <WH8804> the city <WH5892> with fire <WH784>, and all that was therein: only the silver <WH3701>, and the gold <WH2091>, and the vessels <WH3627> of brass <WH5178> and of iron <WH1270>, they put <WH5414> <WH8804> into the treasury <WH214> of the house <WH1004> of the YY <WH3068>.

And Y'hoshuw`a <WH3091> saved <WH2421> Rachav <WH7343> the harlot <WH2181> <WH8802> alive <WH2421> <WH8689>, and her father's <WH1> household <WH1004>, and all that she had; and she dwelleth <WH3427> <WH8799> in <WH7130> Yisra'EL <WH3478> even unto this day <WH3117>; because she hid <WH2244> <WH8689> the messengers <WH4397>, which Y'hoshuw`a <WH3091> sent <WH7971> <WH8804> to spy out <WH7270> <WH8763> Yericho <WH3405>.

And Y'hoshuw`a <WH3091> adjured <WH7650> <WH8686> them at that time <WH6256>, saying <WH559> <WH8800>, Cursed <WH779> <WH8803> be the man <WH376> before <WH6440> the YY <WH3068>, that riseht up <WH6965> <WH8799> and buildeth <WH1129> <WH8804> this city <WH5892> Yericho <WH3405>: he shall lay the foundation <WH3245> <WH8762> thereof in his firstborn <WH1060>, and in his youngest <WH6810> son shall he set up <WH5324> <WH8686> the gates <WH1817> of it.
So the YY <WH3068> was with Y'hoshuw`a <WH3091>; and his fame <WH8089> was noised throughout all the country <WH776>.
